//: Here we list and process all the weapon upgrades! Note that there are some upgrade paths closed due to their material requirement includes an invalid item. Examples of invalid items are felyne-related items and monster subspecie materials.
dynamic_line: Select your weapon to improve.

responses.text:
khezu shock full
[Cannot be further improved]

big blue chopper
[Cannot be further improved]

//: This is the dynamic line that lists the available improvements, displays the material requirements and the weapon damage data.
dynamic_line:
Execute which improvement?

buster sword+ costs 850z and these materials:
- 3 iron ores
- 2 disk stones
It can deal damage by:
*bash: 8 *cut: 13

white serpentblade costs 1100z and these materials:
- 5 giaprey scales
- 3 small monster bones
- 2 carpenterbugs
It can deal damage by:
*bash: 8 *cut: 15

responses.//: A true or false condition whether you have all the required items in your inventory or not.

truefalsetext.true: Improve buster sword to buster sword+!

responses.//: If everything falls to the correct condition, the craftsman will proceed to work on the selected improvement.

effect.//: Lets give all the required materials to the craftsman.
Also, your weapon is required for this job...

Craftsman will then use(destroy) those materials to improve your weapon. Money is also 'used'(destroyed), just in-case. If an error occurs like 'craftsman doesn't have a <material>` at this point, kindly ignore that... That's not a big threat at all.

truefalsetext.true: Improve buster sword to white serpentblade!
